product.longDescription: Ginseng favors well-drained, humus-rich soil on north and east-facing slopes. Grow in 70%+ shade. Harvest roots in fall of 5th or 6th year. NOTE: Because this item is considered an endangered species, it cannot be shipped outside the U.S. Avg. 500 seeds/oz. Packet: 50 seeds.

American Ginseng Herb Seed

Product ID:900.11900

Ginseng favors well-drained, humus-rich soil on north and east-facing slopes. Grow in 70%+ shade. Harvest roots in fall of 5th or 6th year. NOTE: Because this item is considered an endangered species, it cannot be shipped outside the U.S. Avg. 500 seeds/oz. Packet: 50 seeds.
